title: Myrtle Beach police identify suspect in Saturday shooting at Pure Ultra Club
content:
Myrtle Beach Police have identified a suspect in a weekend shooting at Pure Ultra Club on Main Street in Myrtle Beach.
Cleavon Oneal Dantzler, 33, is wanted on five counts of attempted murder for the incident, which happened late Saturday night.
Dantzler is a black male, 5-foot-10, 178 pounds with black hair and brown eyes. He is to be considered armed and dangerous.
Anyone with information should call the department at 843-918-1382 and refer to case 16-023499.
